TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GenericAcl extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents an access control list (ACL) and is the base class for the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl">, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DiscretionaryAcl>, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl>, and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl> classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly unsigned int8 AclRevision

Docs.summary: The revision level of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl">. This value is returned by the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision%2A> property for Access Control Lists (ACLs) that are not associated with Directory Services objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The revision level cannot be changed after an instance of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> class has been created.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly unsigned int8 AclRevisionDS

Docs.summary: The revision level of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl">. This value is returned by the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.Revision%2A> property for Access Control Lists (ACLs) that are associated with Directory Services objects.

Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> object. This length should be used before marshaling the ACL into a binary array with the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl.GetBinaryForm%2A> method.
Docs.value: The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The array into which copies of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"> objects contained by the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> are placed.
The zero-based index of where the copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies each <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"> of the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> into the specified array.
Gets the number of access control entries (ACEs) in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> object.
Docs.value: The number of ACEs in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void GetBinaryForm (byte[] binaryForm, int offset);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetBinaryForm(unsigned int8[] binaryForm, int32 offset) cil managed

Docs.param: The byte array into which the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> is marshaled.
The offset at which to start marshaling.
Docs.summary: Marshals the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves an object that you can use to iterate through the access control entries (ACEs) in an access control list (ACL).
This property is always set to `false`. It is implemented only because it is required for the implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection"> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce this[int index] { get; set; }

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"> to get or set.
Docs.summary: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"> at the specified index.
The maximum allowed binary length of a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl"> object.
Gets the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl">.
Docs.value: A byte value that specifies the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl">.

Docs.summary: This property always returns `null`. It is implemented only because it is required for the implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection"> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The array into which copies of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"> objects contained by the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> are placed.
The zero-based index of where the copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies each <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce"> of the current <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl> into the specified array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator"> class cast as an instance of the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
Docs.returns: A new <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceEnumerator"> object, cast as an instance of the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
